channel.title: KeepIt on JAN BREDERECKE

item.title: How I Started Blogging with blogdown, Hugo, and the KeepIt Theme (overview)
item.description: tl;dr It might be a good weekend’s work, but it is fun, so do it! as Shia LaBeouf famously said… Why start a blog in the first place? Looking at the ever-growing number of blogs dedicated to topics like data science and R, it might seem pointless to some to jump on the bandwagon and set up their own. This might also be amplified by a feeling of not yet being good enough or the more general question of what to contribute to the incredible amount of available information on R, data science, and basically everything around them.
